summary: Tested 7 UI/UX improvements for classifieds app. 5 out of 7 features verified working correctly. 1 inconsistency found (negotiable badge position on homepage), 1 feature could not be fully tested due to auth (notifications filter chips, listing form min chars - but code verified).

ui_bugs.issue: Negotiable badge shows as 'VB' in price row instead of 'Negotiable' badge on bottom-right of image. Homepage uses inline card component different from shared ListingCard.tsx

issues: VB negotiable badge is in price row (content area), not overlaid on image as per requirement

action_items: Update homepage ListingCard component in /app/frontend/app/(tabs)/index.tsx to move negotiable badge from price row to bottom-right of image, matching the ListingCard.tsx implementation
critical_code_review_comments: Homepage uses inline ListingCard component (lines 168-318 in index.tsx) instead of shared /src/components/ListingCard.tsx - creates inconsistency
Notifications page filter chips (Badges, Challenges, Credits) require authentication to view - code verified at lines 542-574 in notifications.tsx

test_credentials.note: Login credentials invalid - could not test authenticated features

context_for_next_testing_agent: Tested UI improvements: category inline search (PASS), category-specific filters like Apple/Samsung/Petrol/Diesel (PASS), country selection modal (PASS), nearby toggle removed (PASS). Negotiable badge position needs fix on homepage. Notifications filter chips and listing form min chars verified in code but not visually tested due to auth.

category_inline_search.details: Search on /category/electronics stays inline, does not redirect to /search page

category_specific_filters.details: Electronics: Apple, Samsung, Sony, LG, Under Warranty, No Warranty. Auto: Petrol, Diesel, Electric, Hybrid, Automatic, Manual, 2024+, etc.

notifications_filter_chips.details: FILTER_CHIPS array at lines 67-78 includes badge, challenge, credit chips. Visual test blocked by auth

negotiable_badge_position.details: ListingCard.tsx correctly positions badge on image (lines 196-201), but homepage index.tsx still shows VB in price row

nearby_toggle_removed.details: No 'Include nearby' toggle found on homepage UI

country_selection_modal.details: Click 'Select Location' -> 'Browse locations' shows country list with flags (Australia, Canada, Germany, etc.)

listing_form_min_chars.details: Title min 10 chars, Description min 20 chars display at lines 1583-1610 in post/index.tsx. Visual test blocked by auth
